EmailTemplate.description: Triggers if win/loss reason has not been updated.
EmailTemplate.name: Update win/loss reasons for opportunities
EmailTemplate.subject: Please update Win/Loss reasons for {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
Please update Win/Loss reasons for {!Opportunity.Name} last modified on {!Opportunity.LastStageChangeDate}.
{!Opportunity.Link}
Make sure you are logged to Salesforce.com (http://crm.ryder.com) before clicking on the link, then review the record and take appropriate action.
If you click on the link before logging to Salesforce.com, you will be taken to the standard Salesforce.com login page and you won't be able to log in from there.
Regards, Sales Admin
